ops.description: addPaletteColors_0xe9({sourcePaletteId:0, targetPaletteId:16, r:0, g:Bank[5][0], b:Bank[5][0], size:255});
shake({u1:0, u2:0, count:2, u3:0, u4:0, aplitude:8, speed:4});
fade({r:80, g:0, b:0, speed:32, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:40, g:0, b:0, speed:32, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:32, type:5, adjust:255});
shake({u1:0, u2:0, count:2, u3:0, u4:0, aplitude:4, speed:64});
shake({u1:0, u2:0, count:2, u3:0, u4:0, aplitude:4, speed:64});
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:14}); // Received Key Item "Huge Materia"!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:3}); // {Cloud}
“We'll hide it somewhere secluded.”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Cloud}
“You think it could be…?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:4}); // {Cloud}
“It looks like a key to something.”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:8}); // “…Exact date of origin undetermined…”
showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:9}); // “…Estimated to be several thousand years…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Cloud}
“The Key of the Ancients…”
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // Received Key Item "Key to Ancients"!
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

dialogStrings:
{Cloud}
“An unconditional surrender, huh?”
{CHOICE}We're your prisoners
{CHOICE}Don't bet on it…

{Cloud}
“It looks like a key to something.”
